name: Charles Munger
body:
My team works on infrastructure that powers many Android apps at Google - if that sounds interesting to you, please reach out!

Skills
-------------
* Android programming
* Concurrent Java Programming
* Security

Projects I Contribute To
-------------
* [Robolectric](https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric), a unit testing framework for Android.
* [Cronet](https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/master/components/cronet/), a set of Android wrappers for Chromium's net package. It offers a fully asynchronous and zero-copy Java API, as well as support for the UDP-based [quic](https://www.chromium.org/quic) transport format.

School Projects
-------------
* [jPregel on AWS](https://charlesmunger.github.com/jpregel-aws/), an implementation of Googleâ€™s Pregel distributed graph processing engine on Amazon Web Services, designed for ease of use and trivial deployment - even for users with no systems background, or any familiarity with cloud services. 
* [Touch to Text](https://github.com/charlesmunger/touch-to-text), a web-of-trust and public-key based chat system, that performs key exchange over NFC. The server runs as a TOR hidden service.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
